name.description: Display name for the run. Default: ``None``.
name.title: Name

save_dir.description: Path where data is saved. Default: ``.``.
save_dir.title: Save Dir

version.description: Sets the version, mainly used to resume a previous run. Default: ``None``.
version.title: Version

offline.description: Run offline (data can be streamed later to wandb servers). Default: ``False``.
offline.title: Offline

anonymous.description: Enables or explicitly disables anonymous logging. Default: ``None``.
anonymous.title: Anonymous

project.description: The name of the project to which this run will belong. Default: ``None``.
project.title: Project

log_model.description:
Whether/how to log model checkpoints as W&B artifacts. Default: ``False``.
If 'all', checkpoints are logged during training.
If True, checkpoints are logged at the end of training.
If False, no checkpoints are logged.
log_model.title: Log Model

prefix.description: A string to put at the beginning of metric keys. Default: ``''``.
prefix.title: Prefix

experiment.description: WandB experiment object. Automatically set when creating a run. Default: ``None``.
experiment.title: Experiment

checkpoint_name.description: Name of the model checkpoint artifact being logged. Default: ``None``.
checkpoint_name.title: Checkpoint Name

additional_init_parameters.description: Additional parameters to pass to wandb.init(). Default: ``{}``.
additional_init_parameters.title: Additional Init Parameters
